feature.label: Design Studio Utility Pack
feature.description:
com.sample.utilities ==============================
A package of Design Studio Utility Addons:
SlideShow - A slideshow component using JSSOR library SuperImage - An SAPUI5 extended Image component with a Base-64 encoding property sheet HTMLTemplate - HTML and JavaScript inject for pre-SDK prototyping DoubleSidedTile - Like HTMLTemplate, but it flips, because it's fun. HighCharts - Highcharts Chart wrapper - Be sure you have a Highcharts license if you use in production
Free as in free beer.
mike.howles @ gmail.com if you want to chat about Design Studio SDK goodness.
Find me on SCN: http://scn.sap.com/people/mike.howles4
feature.license: You break it, you buy it. Use for whatever you want.
